alert.note: Alert for Kane (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 10:30AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...The Hildale/Colorado City area, including the following counties, Kane and Washington. * WHEN...Until 1030 AM MDT Thursday. Peak water levels expected later this afternoon or evening before subsiding slowly Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. Water levels may continue to rise through this evening before subsiding Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1026 AM MDT, Local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hildale/Colorado City.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
